summary: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.
cast: Sarah Polley|Ving Rhames|Jake Weber|Mekhi Phifer|Ty Burrell|Michael Kelly|Kevin Zegers|Michael Barry|Lindy Booth|Jayne Eastwood|Boyd Banks|Inna Korobkina|R.D. Reid|Kim Poirier|Matt Frewer|Louis Ferreira|Hannah Lochner|Bruce Bohne|Ermes Blarasin|Sanjay Talwar|Kim Roberts|Tim Post|Matt Sadowski|Philip DeWilde|Colm Magner|Luigia Zucaro|Geoff Williams|Mike Realba|David Campbell|Phillip MacKenzie|Laura de Carteret|Georgia Craig|Tino Monte|Chris Gillett|Derek Keurvorst|Dan Duran|Neville Edwards|Sandy Jobin-Bevans|Natalie Brown|Liz West|Blu|Scott H. Reiniger|Tom Savini|Ken Foree|Kim Kerns|Darren Marsman|Zack Snyder
title: Amanecer de los muertos
